remarks: Convert an identity of the operation to the analogous identity on the function operation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jul-2014.)
statement:
offveq.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
offveq.2 $e |- ( ph -> F Fn A ) $.
offveq.3 $e |- ( ph -> G Fn A ) $.
offveq.4 $e |- ( ph -> H Fn A ) $.
offveq.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> ( F ` x ) = B ) $.
offveq.6 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> ( G ` x ) = C ) $.
offveq.7 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> ( B R C ) = ( H ` x ) ) $.
offveq $p |- ( ph -> ( F oF R G ) = H ) $.
$d A x $.
$d F x $.
$d G x $.
$d H x $.
$d R x $.
$d ph x $.
